text: “ Shameless ” star Ethan Cutkosky, who plays trouble - prone youth Carl Gallagher on the Showtime series, has reached a plea agreement in the DUI case he was facing. Cutkosky, 18, pleaded Thursday guilty to one count of reckless driving, a representative for the Burbank, Calif., city attorney ’ s office told TheWrap on Thursday. In exchange for the plea, the DUI charge was dismissed, and the actor received two years of probation. Also Read :'Shameless'Star Ethan Cutkosky Arrested on DUI Charge The actor must also attend either 26 Narcotics Anonymous sessions, or a 12 - hour class.
